head.title: Looking for a way to relax?
head.description: Relax Shiatsu is the Bath shiatsu practice of Gary Benson.

body.p: Everyday life can be hectic. Just getting everything done can take its toll on our bodies, leaving us tired and irritable. It's important to take some time for yourself.

Shiatsu is a hands-on therapy rooted in traditional Chinese medicine. By gently moving and stretching the body, shiatsu aims to restore a natural state of balance and harmony. The result is a deep sense of relaxation.
Shiatsu is performed fully clothed. A typical session lasts about an hour and costs &price;.
